content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Complex at position(-28, -61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill and stone furnace setup with wooden chest and burner inserter intermediaries
- Transport belts connecting the components
- Multiple wooden chests storing iron ore (668 units) and iron plates (57 units)

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(-10, -59)
Consists of following entities:
- Three burner mining drills in sequence
- Transport belts connecting the drills
- Wooden chests for storage with burner inserters
- Currently mining iron ore (multiple chests containing ore)

### Smelting Line at position(0, 0)
Consists of following entities:
- Four stone furnaces in sequence
- Burner inserters feeding coal and materials
- Wooden chests for input/output storage
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Power Generation System at position(4.5, 20.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(4.5, 20.5)
- Boiler at position(-1.5, 22.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-3.5, 27.5)
- Pipe network connecting water supply
- Currently not operational due to missing connections

### Research Lab Setup
- Lab present but not operational due to no power
- Has automation science packs loaded (10 units)

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Errors
- Lab placement attempted at invalid position (0.5, 6.5)
- Ensure entity exists at specified position before attempting to reference it

### Power Connection Errors
- Electric pole connections require at least two waypoints
- Ensure proper placement of electric poles with valid connection points between source and destination

### Resource Management Issues
- Multiple burner mining drills are out of fuel
- Ensure consistent fuel supply to burner-type entities

### Fluid System Issues
- Steam engine has no input liquid
- Boiler missing fuel
- Ensure proper connection of fluid networks between offshore pump, boiler and steam engine

### Transport System Blockages
- Transport belts blocked at certain positions
- Clear blocked belts to maintain proper item flow
- Specific blockage noted at position(6.5, 4.5)
